body:
This captures really well how sex feels likez literally did it with my bf after watching this.
Fucking 20/10 and god.

Pages 81 to 96, 139 to 160, & 191 to 208 are ALL the hottest and most exciting I've read by far! I cannot believe that it's taken me so long to recognize that it was also done by Dagashi! 💜However, I did not care for the public use/solicitation on page 181; although it is tagged as "HAREM" the male character displayed high discomfort. Only when all partners involved happily consent can a group be considered a Harem, this female was a whore. (there is nothing wrong with that, it is the world's oldest profession)
 –Aimiee Lewd Lemieux
